Package com.example.questplugin.model

Class QuestTemplate.Objective

java.lang.Object
com.example.questplugin.model.QuestTemplate.Objective
Enclosing class:
QuestTemplate
public static class QuestTemplate.Objective extends Object
Represents an objective within a quest.

      type - The type of the objective.

      targetAmount - The target amount for this objective.
      description - A description of the objective (optional).
